message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. This is a great deal, considering its true value is worth much more than that.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can find something similar elsewhere within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about finding something similar elsewhere, but this product is truly unique and has a lot to offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110. This is a great compromise, considering its value is still worth more than that.
